p: Fusarium graminearum (MTCC 1893) capable for the synthesis of DON and ZEA was obtained from Microbial Type Culture Collection and Gene Bank (MTCC), India, and grown on SDA for 7 days at 28°C. The fungal spores were collected by soft scrape in sterile peptone solution supplemented with 0.01% Tween 80. The spore number was counted by hemocytometer and their number was set to 1 × 10 6 spores per mL.
